#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       int x;
       string a,b;
       
       cin >> x;
       
       while(x--)
       {
          cin >> a >> b;
          if(a.find(b) >= 0 && a.find(b) <= a.length())
             cout << "1" << endl;
          else
             cout << "0" << endl;
       }
       
       return 0;
       }
